sliders.subTitle: We'll Sing and We'll Shout: The Life and Times of W. W. Phelps
sliders.text: In this comprehensive biography, learn of the trials and triumphs of W. W. Phelps, a central Latter-day Saint leader, printer, scribe, ghostwriter, and monumental hymn writer.

sliders.title: Recent or Upcoming Books
sliders.subTitle: Thou Art the Christ, the Son of the Living God: The Person and Work of Jesus in the New Testament
sliders.text: While Jesus and his disciples were at or near Caesarea Philippi, Peter testified that Jesus was “the Christ, the Son of the living God.” Martha had a similar divine testimony, proclaiming, “I believe that thou art the Christ, the Son of God.” In much the same way, a standard part of Latter-day Saint discourse includes bearing testimony that “Jesus is the Christ,” but what do we mean when we say that Jesus is the Christ?
